__comment__purpose: Example download config. Copy to config.download.json or generate via setup-client.ps1.
__comment__where_values_come_from: Most values come from .env or Terraform outputs.
__comment__aws_profile: AWS CLI profile name configured by setup-client.ps1 (SSO). Example: SecureDownload
__comment__aws_region: AWS region where the transfer bucket exists. Example: ap-southeast-2
__comment__bucket_name: S3 transfer bucket. Find in Terraform outputs or AWS console.
__comment__incoming_prefix: Prefix containing encrypted payloads and artefacts.
__comment__downloaded_prefix: Archive prefix used by downloader after verification.
__comment__kms_key_id: Full ARN of the CMK used for decryption (must match bucket CMK).
__comment__cse_manifest_suffix: Manifest suffix used by upload script (must match).
__comment__ciphertext_extension: Encrypted payload extension used by uploader.
__comment__enable_log: If true, writes logs to download_log_directory.
__comment__download_log_directory: Local log directory; created if missing.
